SELECT bp.PRCD,bp.`NAME`,pb.shape_area,bp.ADCD,ea.ADNM, pb.shape_leng,bp.project_scale,bp.PRLV,rl.range_line FROM dts_yh_basic_data_db_bm_project bp LEFT JOIN dts_yh_basic_data_db_att_polder_base pb ON bp.PRCD = pb.prcd LEFT JOIN dts_yh_basic_data_db_pro_range_line rl ON rl.prcd = bp.PRCD LEFT JOIN dts_yh_basic_data_db_bm_ei_adcd ea ON bp.ADCD = ea.ADCD WHERE bp.project_category = '圩区'
AND adcd = #{adcd}
